summary.span: 用作基类，由支持内部分页的控件使用。

span.span: Functions as a base class used by controls that support internal pagination.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (ASP.NET 移动应用和网站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类公开了某些属性、方法和事件，这些事件对所有支持内部分页的控件通用。The class exposes certain properties, methods, and events common to all controls that are capable of internal pagination. 从类继承的所有控件 也支持自定义分页，称为分块。All controls that inherit from the class also support custom pagination, known as chunking. 与类相似 ，此类用于具有长文本长度的控件，如 、 或 。Similar to the class, this class is used for controls that have long text length, such as a , , or .

value.span: 当前窗体页上的第一个可见项。

span.span: The first item visible on the current form page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果控件在当前窗体页上不可见，则此值为-1。If the control is not visible on the current form page, this value is -1.

protected: abstract property int InternalItemCount { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取控件中的项数。

span.span: Gets the number of items in the control.

summary.span: 此 API 已废弃不用。
若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (ASP.NET 移动应用和网站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.
The number of items in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生自的类 必须重写此继承的属性。Classes that derive from must override this inherited property. 属性和和类的属性之间的区别在于， 如果在 加载控件视图状态之前调用了属性，它将返回视图状态中的项数，这与返回零的属性的行为不同 。The difference between the property and the property of the and classes is that if the property is called before the control view state is loaded, it returns the number of items in the view state, unlike the behavior of the property, which returns zero.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int ItemCount { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.ItemCount : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置控件中的项数。

span.span: Gets or sets the count of items in the control.

summary.span: 此 API 已废弃不用。
若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (ASP.NET 移动应用和网站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.
The count of items in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须启用自定义分页。Custom pagination must be enabled. 默认值为0，指示不能使用自定义分页。The default is 0, indicating that you cannot use custom paging. 用于项的单位取决于控件。The units used for an item depend on the control. 例如， 控件可能使用列表项作为单元，而 控件可以使用字符。For example, a control might use list items as units, whereas a control might use characters.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int ItemsPerPage { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.ItemsPerPage : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置分页后每页所显示的项数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of items displayed per page after pagination.

summary.span: 此 API 已废弃不用。
若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (ASP.NET 移动应用和网站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

value.span: 分页后每页显示的项数。

span.span: The number of items displayed per page after pagination.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果为零，则分页不受此属性的影响。If zero, pagination is not affected by this property. 如果为非零值，则会在对窗体进行分页时覆盖每页显示的项。If nonzero, overrides items displayed per page when the form is paginated. 默认值为零。The default value is zero. 支持内部分页的移动控件还提供一种称为自定义分页的功能。Mobile controls that support internal pagination also provide a feature called custom pagination. 通常，此类控件要求您提供其可以显示的所有数据。Normally, such controls require you to provide all the data that they can display. 开发人员指定属性中列表的总项数 。Developers specify the total number of items that are in the list in the property. 属性指定控件每页显示的项数。The property specifies how many items the control displays per page. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性呈现每个页面200项列表中的8项。The following code example shows how to use the property to render eight items of a 200-item list per page. [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileLoadListEventArgsSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileLoadListEventArgsSample/cs/default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileLoadListEventArgsSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileLoadListEventArgsSample/vb/default.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overridable ReadOnly Property ItemWeight As Integer
protected: virtual property int ItemWeight { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取控件中单个项的近似权重。

span.span: Gets the approximate weight of a single item in the control.

summary.span: 此 API 已废弃不用。
若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (ASP.NET 移动应用和网站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

value.span: 控件中单个项的近似权重。

span.span: The approximate weight of a single item in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值-1 指示必须使用元素的默认权重。A value of -1 indicates that the default weight for the element must be used. 继承类必须重写此属性。The inheriting class must override this property. 有关重写此属性的详细信息，请参阅 [分页支持](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/hhfw2x5a(v=vs.100))。For further information about overriding this property, see [Pagination Support](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/hhfw2x5a(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建并使用自定义列表控件。The following code example creates and uses a custom list control. 该示例演示如何重写 类的属性 ，以指定新的控件权重。The example demonstrates how to override the property of a class to specify a new control weight. [!code-aspx-csharp[MobilePagedControlSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobilePagedControlSample/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobilePagedControlSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobilePagedControlSample/vb/Default.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event LoadItems As LoadItemsEventHandler

summary.span: 在控件自定义分页且需要更多数据时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a control is custom-paginated and needs more data.

summary.span: 此 API 已废弃不用。
若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (ASP.NET 移动应用和网站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果控件是自定义分页的，则不会显式绑定控件。When control is custom-paginated, you do not explicitly bind the control. 分页后，控件引发此事件，指示需要数据的哪些部分。After pagination, the control raises this event, indicating what part of the data is required. 应用程序可以处理此事件，并将控件绑定到所需的数据。The application can handle this event and bind the control with the required data. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性呈现每个页面200项列表中的8项。The following example shows how to use the property to render eight items of a 200-item list per page. [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileLoadListEventArgsSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileLoadListEventArgsSample/cs/default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileLoadListEventArgsSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileLoadListEventArgsSample/vb/default.aspx#1)]
